typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderDetailID as string,
		OrderID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		Quantity as integer,
		UnitCost as decimal(10,0),
		LineNumber as integer,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source2
source(output(
		OrderID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		OrderDate as date,
		ShipDate as string,
		TotalCost as decimal(10,0),
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source3
source3 derive(SouceSystemID = 1) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1, source2 join(source1@OrderID == source2@OrderID,
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
